docs.text: Optom Tools Welcome. These are a set of tools for optometrists. Installation Install with pip or your other favourite package manager (e.g. pipenv or poetry ). pip install optom-tools Example >>> from optom_tools import Prescription >>> prescription = Prescription("+1.00/-2.00x180") >>> prescription.transpose() >>> print(str(prescription)) "-1.00/+2.00x90" prescription Visual Acuity
